lines: Ndila mumvwa Mufutuli, Ula ndiita mucilile;
Mu moyo lilamba ijwi, Lila ita bola we mubi.
Moyo wangu ï¿½lakomana, Ndicilile munzila yonse.
Mu cibanda konditola, Ndisanine kulya kwako;
Ndikuyande ziindi zyonse, Ndicilile munzila yonse;
Konditola a luboko, A luyando lutamani;
Undi kwelÕa luse lwako, Ndicilile munzila yonse.
